page.title: 17Treviscoe Male Voice Choir
page.content: There is a strong musical tradition in the area which is expressed in choirs and silver bands (brass bands). Local residents often take up instruments as children and receive tuition from parents or neighbours. A nearby band of national renown is the{St.Dennis {Silver Band.} The area has numerous choirs and male voice choirs predominate. The{ {Treviscoe Male Voice Choir} participates in national competitions and has won many trophies including a major prize at The International Eisteddfod,Llangollen.The choir was formed 49 years ago and still has three founder members.It has 49 members.The choir helped in making the film{"White Gold",}the story of a clay workers' strike.
